channel.title: Frost Blades II - A heterogeneous rendition of the RuneScape Protocols
channel.description:
[CENTER][COLOR=#008000]Welcome to Frost Blades II, we are (as far as we know) the first RSPS with any sort of diversity in revision (not including loading revisions on the same cache) and this is our project thread.
The Aim Give players an enjoyable experience in the RSPS World, wether they like Oldschool, a bit in the middle or the EOC. We have worlds which diverse in revision, and we have 5 worlds in total.
World 1 : 742 World 2 : 742 PVP World 3 : 317 World 4 : 317 PVP World 5 : 751 EoC
Information about the server You must register to play. All the worlds are handled by one login server. The login server handles logins (obviously!), therefore you only need 1 account for all the worlds. Your character can't be logged into any 2 worlds at the same time. You can only login to any one world at one time per computer (So you can have 2 seperate accounts logged into 2 seperate worlds, but not 2 seperate accounts into one world). The login server handles private messaging and friends chat, so if you have a friend who plays the old school server, you can message them from a new school server. Your character levels and items are different from worlds 1-2-5 to worlds 3-4. This is because of the highscores, it's easier to earn experience on the newer worlds because of activities such as RuneSpan, so the competition for the top spot wouldn't be fair. When you log into the EOC world you will have your items from Worlds 1 and 2 (742). World 2 consists of a PVP sever; you will earn your items in the normal world and pk here. World 2 is entirely pvp apart from lumbridge courtyard. [/COLOR] [img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/2061/kc3b.png[/img]
There will be one client, which updates automatically and runs all the games. [img]http://i.imgur.com/2212txL.jpg[/img]
We have our own custom chat system which is integrated into the launcher so the players can interact (works similar to XAT). [img]http://i.imgur.com/E11OUMe.png[/img]
[spoiler=Setup] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hrluk0J.png[/img] [img]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/3948/4j07.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uM8v03I.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SbqNA72.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0Tw9tfP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ArDvBVz.png[/img] [img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/5184/non8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yK3XOUW.png[/img] [/spoiler] [/center]
[CENTER][SIZE=5][COLOR=#00FF00]OldSchool[/COLOR][/SIZE] [spoiler=World 3 and 4 progress] [CENTER] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] [u][b]Prayer[/b][/u]: - Burying - Every prayer working properly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] [u][b]Agility[/b][/u]: - Gnome Course - Wilderness Course - Barbarian Course - Run energy affected by weight and level
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [u][b]Firemaking[/b][/u]: - Perfect Fire Making
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img] [u][b]Woodcutting[/b][/u]: - Stumps and regrowing trees - Correct hatchet animations - All trees cut-able - Birds nest falling out - Canoes
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b][u]Mining[/u][/b]: - Emptying and refilling rocks - All ores can be mined - Correct pickaxe finding and animations - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gems
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img] [b][u]Fletching[/u][/b]: - All logs can be fletched - Correct interfaces - Fletch 5, 10, x, all
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b][u]Crafting[/u][/b]: - Gem cutting - Tanning - Crafting tanned hides - Spinning & Picking flax - Pottery - Jewelry Molding
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] [b][u]Thieving[/u][/b]: - Stall Thieving - NPC Thieving - Correct Animations & GFX - Correct Respawn Times
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [u][b]Cooking[/b][/u]: - All fish cookable - All meat cookable - Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews. - Correct anims & delays - Working interface with multiple amount options - Lumbridge cooking range bonus - Eating food - Wine
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [u][b]Runecrafting[/b][/u]: - Altar Enterting - Tiaras - All Altars - Abyss
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img] [u][b]Herblore[/b][/u]: - All potions makeable - Itentifying herbs - Weapon poisioning
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [u][b]Smithing[/b][/u]: - All bars smithable - Smelting - Correct anims, working interfaces & objects
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b][u]Fishing[/u][/b]: - All fish can be caught - Big net fishing - Correct item requirements - Fishing spots located all around the world - Correct animations
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img] [u][b] Slayer[/b][/u]
- Working slayer gem - Working slayer shop - Tasks where you are required to wield any special equipment, e.g. boots out of the slayer shop - Generating task's bound on combatlevel/slayerlevel - Remove task forever for slayer points - Cancel task for slayer points - All slayer masters - All slayer masters can give you the slayer location - XP after each killed NPC, + XP after finishing task
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6DPd9.gif[/img] [u][b] -Farming[/u][/b] - Planting Allotments - Flowers - Herbs - Planting Trees - Diseased - Watering
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img] [u][b]Combat[/b][/u]: - PvP fully complete - PvN fully complete - X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death) - Perfect max hit formulas - Perfect accuracy formula - Every weapon special attack - Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) - Equipment requirements - Degradable equipment - Weapon poisoning [/CENTER] [/spoiler][/center]
[CENTER] [img]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/1513/buru.png[/img] Display Names added [IMG]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/2052/4ds8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U2mEFmn.png[/img]
Will add case sensitivity

item.title: Frost Blades II - A heterogeneous rendition of the RuneScape Protocols
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

The multiple worlds being connected is really cool I like it. Don’t let anybody tell you it’s not a good idea. The site also looks very good. However, other than that the servers seem average so I hope you add some original content to them to attract more players.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Tom:

While we’re on the topic the multiple account rule is still standing, it’s just more lenient and is reviewed on a case by case basis as opposed to just blanketing the entire thing in ban ban ban.

looks at David

Read full topic

item.title: Frost Blades II - A heterogeneous rendition of the RuneScape Protocols
item.dc:creator: @Decoder Decoder
item.description:
@Decoder wrote:

[quote=“Tom, post:29, topic:536330”]I don’t think so. You’re not reserving posts you don’t even need with multiple accounts, either merge it very quickly or I’ll throw it in the same post and it’ll look terrible. You should know that by using these reserve posts and multiple accounts you’re not enhancing the aesthetics at all, I’d suggest you look into anchor links and crop properly to make a nice coherent image. Everybody else gets by without multiple accounts and reserve posts and so will you.

While we’re on the topic the multiple account rule is still standing, it’s just more lenient and is reviewed on a case by case basis as opposed to just blanketing the entire thing in ban ban ban.[/quote]

Already changed it, was thinking what all the fuss was about so tried to merge the first 2 posts (they had a lot of pictures), I genuinely had no clue there was no limit to the number of pictures you could post (there usually is if you look at IPB or VB RSPS Communities).

Read full topic

Tom:

While we’re on the topic the multiple account rule is still standing, it’s just more lenient and is reviewed on a case by case basis as opposed to just blanketing the entire thing in ban ban ban.

Since when? Thomas we are going to have issues. Might have to fight me irl kid.

item.title: Frost Blades II - A heterogeneous rendition of the RuneScape Protocols
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I don’t think so. You’re not reserving posts you don’t even need with multiple accounts, either merge it very quickly or I’ll throw it in the same post and it’ll look terrible. You should know that by using these reserve posts and multiple accounts you’re not enhancing the aesthetics at all, I’d suggest you look into anchor links and crop properly to make a nice coherent image. Everybody else gets by without multiple accounts and reserve posts and so will you.

While we’re on the topic the multiple account rule is still standing, it’s just more lenient and is reviewed on a case by case basis as opposed to just blanketing the entire thing in ban ban ban.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Decoder Decoder
item.description:
@Decoder wrote:

Davidi2:

I’m not being picky

Laughed so hard.

How can a moderator whose supposed to enforce rules say its “ugly”, it follows all rules?

I don’t think it bends rules at all, no accounts were created for the sole purpose of making the posts. I needed a MoparScape account and my friend already had one. :palm:

Read full topic

item.title: Frost Blades II - A heterogeneous rendition of the RuneScape Protocols
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:23, topic:536330”]You know as well as I do that nobody has access to the anti-spam addon except MITB (and maybe Tom? idk). That said I’ve deleted about 5 movie spammers within an hour of their post lately. And I’m pretty sure those are different types of spammers than the ones that MITB’s addon is meant to catch, it might have to be manual removal. And this is all irrelevant anyways… not sure how we got to movie spammers from multiple accounts…

I see no reason to create another account to let you have multiple posts as one topic start, surely that was more effort in the first place than just putting it all in the OP? If it really is that much of a bother I’ll do it for him if he wants.[/quote]

Of course it was more effort to go into that but sometimes people don’t think of that. No one made it into a bother other than yourself, you were the not who threatened to delete posts lol. If you think it really matters then go ahead but you’re just giving yourself unnecessary work.

Read full topic
item.source: Frost Blades II - A heterogeneous rendition of the RuneScape Protocols

item.title: Frost Blades II - A heterogeneous rendition of the RuneScape Protocols
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You know as well as I do that nobody has access to the anti-spam addon except MITB (and maybe Tom? idk). That said I’ve deleted about 5 movie spammers within an hour of their post lately. And I’m pretty sure those are different types of spammers than the ones that MITB’s addon is meant to catch, it might have to be manual removal. And this is all irrelevant anyways… not sure how we got to movie spammers from multiple accounts…

I see no reason to create another account to let you have multiple posts as one topic start, surely that was more effort in the first place than just putting it all in the OP? If it really is that much of a bother I’ll do it for him if he wants. You’re taking this well out of proportion, I’m asking him to merge topic posts, I’m not giving him an infraction or removing his development… no need to critique my moderating capabilities or call me a dickhead for something so trivial

Read full topic
item.source: Frost Blades II - A heterogeneous rendition of the RuneScape Protocols

item.title: Frost Blades II - A heterogeneous rendition of the RuneScape Protocols
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:19, topic:536330”]Rules broken:

  1. No multiple accounts. This has always been a rule and it’s only recently that it hasn’t been enforced in some cases when people want to make new accounts to start fresh.
  2. No creating accounts to post on your own threads.
  3. No spamming (while the posts are legitimate posts there is no reason at all to have 5 or whatever posts in your account for one thread and it looks like spam)

I’m not being picky, and he can do it just as easily as I can, so how is that being a dickhead? You can get the BBC code from another users post by using the quote button and removing the quote tags. I was going to delete all of the other posts either way, I’m just giving him time to get the BBC from them so he doesn’t have to rewrite it before I do. It’s actually considered less aggressive to let people make their own changes to fit the rules rather than doing it for them. He can easily do it in less than 2 minutes, as could I, but I chose to let him do it himself.[/quote]
You know as well as I that the multiple account rule hasn’t been strongly enforced in a long time. Given I didn’t realise the other account was his, no IP check anymore :(. This is hardly spamming, instead of trying to fix posts that are causing no harm try fixing the anti spam addon to catch the daily movie spammers. It isn’t bothering anyone other than you, it doesn’t directly break any rules that are game ending catastrophes. I don’t see why you couldn’t have just let it be, I mean, it’s not causing harm to anything and it honestly doesn’t look that bad, it’s a bit unorganised but it doesn’t look that bad.

I’ve asked him to change it but it just seems like effort for no reason.

Edit, not sure if Taharok removed it or not, I think we discussed it in one of the staff meetings, the logs should be in the staff board.

Read full topic

    [/quote]

item.title: Frost Blades II - A heterogeneous rendition of the RuneScape Protocols
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Rules broken:

  1. No multiple accounts. This has always been a rule and it’s only recently that it hasn’t been enforced in some cases when people want to make new accounts to start fresh.
  2. No creating accounts to post on your own threads.
  3. No spamming (while the posts are legitimate posts there is no reason at all to have 5 or whatever posts in your account for one thread and it looks like spam)

I’m not being picky, and he can do it just as easily as I can, so how is that being a dickhead? You can get the BBC code from another users post by using the quote button and removing the quote tags. I was going to delete all of the other posts either way, I’m just giving him time to get the BBC from them so he doesn’t have to rewrite it before I do. It’s actually considered less aggressive to let people make their own changes to fit the rules rather than doing it for them. He can easily do it in less than 2 minutes, as could I, but I chose to let him do it himself.

Read full topic
item.source: Frost Blades II - A heterogeneous rendition of the RuneScape Protocols

item.title: Frost Blades II - A heterogeneous rendition of the RuneScape Protocols
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Decoder, post:17, topic:536330”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=655142.msg4387488#msg4387488 date=1386203194]

Edit the first post to include all of the others, you dont need 5 posts for one thread when you’re not over the character limit. It also does not improve readability at ALL. Just use the internal links bulletin board code. (example in my tutorial and download lists)

It was supposed to, if I had the use of spoilers at my resource >.>
[/quote]Just please follow my instructions, you have another 48 hours or I’ll start deleting the extra posts.

Could you point me to the rules/guidelines about thread layouts?

The post ticks all the boxes in the rules: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,313422.0.html it’s just David being picky really. It’s down to the moderator that handles it, moderators discretion and what not. Just fit what you can into one post. Oh and David instead of being a dickhead you could edit the posts into one yourself with very, very little effort. You could actually edit them easier than Viper, since there’s two accounts involved. But meh, who knows.

I read these before posting (ofc) but I thought there were other rules about actual thread layout that I wasn’t aware about? :/[/quote]
Nope, what you see is what you get. You can style the thread as you like as long as it fits those rules.

Read full topic

item.title: Frost Blades II - A heterogeneous rendition of the RuneScape Protocols
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Just gonna go ahead and give everyone a bit of insight into what’s happening, I joined this project a few days ago after an offer from Viper, due to there being 5 worlds he needs help running them and that’s where I stepped in. From what I gather we’ve both ran pretty large servers and got enough experience between us to ensure that the worlds are run without any hiccups, or as little as possible.

Due to my busy schedule and the progress that still needs to be made on the game the server will not be opening until the 1st of January 2014. Stay tuned for more updates, the prolonged release also allows myself and Viper time to devise some kind of strategy into making this work. I’m not sure if there’s ever been a server with this many worlds intertwined so it’s going to be trial any error to begin with so this extended period helps us there, too.

Once the site is fully functional again we’ll let you guys know and we can spark discussions on the forum towards what you guys like. Stay tuned.

Read full topic
